Translations.Text: “Ndikudzasonkhanitsidwa ndi kuonekera poyera zomwe zidali m’mitima
“Ndithu tsiku limenelo Mbuye wawo adzawadziwa kwambiri (ndikuwalongosolera zonse zochita zawo)
“Kugunda kwa phokoso (la Qiyâma)
“Kodi kugunda kwa phokosolo ndi chiyani
“Ndichiyani chingakudziwitse za kugunda kwa phokoso (la Qiyâma komwe kudzawakomole anthu)
“Limenelo ndi tsiku limene anthu adzakhala ngati agulugufe obalalika
“Ndipo mapiri adzakhala ngati ubweya womwazidwa (wongouluka uku ndi uku mumlengalenga)
“Tsono amene muyeso wake (wa zinthu zabwino) udzalemere (ndikupepuka zoipa)
“Ndiye kuti iye adzakhala mu umoyo wosangalatsa (patsiku la chiweruziro)
“Ndipo yemwe muyeso wake (wa zinthu zabwino) udzapepuka (ndi kulemera zoipa)
“Ndiye kuti mbuto yake ndi ku Hawiya
“Kodi ndi chiyani chingakudziwitse za Hawiya
“Umenewo ndi Moto woyaka mwa ukali
“Kwakutangwanitsani kusonkhanitsa (chuma chambiri ndi ana)
“Mpakana mwapita kumanda (mwamwalira ndikukalowa m’manda)
“Sichoncho! Mudziwa posachedwapa
“Ndiponso sichoncho! Mudziwa posachedwapa
“Sichoncho! mukadakhala mukudziwa, kudziwa kwachitsimikizo (sibwenzi mukutangwanika ndi za mdziko)
“Ndithudi mudzauona Moto
“Kenako mudzauona ndithu ndi diso lachitsimikizo
“Tsono patsikulo ndithudi mudzafunsidwa za mtendere (omwe munapatsidwa)
